response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I understand its worth to you is $12,000. To facilitate this transaction and ensure mutual benefit, I am offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 11000}
